original_text: You had sex with the Egyptians, who lived near to you. They were ready to have sex with you at any time. So you lived as a prostitute more and more and you made me very angry.
korean_text: 하체가 큰 네 이웃 나라 애굽 사람과도 음행하되 심히 음란히 하여 내 진노를 샀도다

sentences.original_text: You had sex with the Egyptians
They were ready to have sex with you at any time
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 언제든지 당신과 성관계를 할 준비가 되어 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: So you lived as a prostitute more and more
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 당신은 점점 더 창녀처럼 살았습니다

sentences.original_text: and you made me very angry
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신은 저를 매우 화나게 했습니다
